Description: Pottery ostracon, with one line of incised inscription - Coptic, starting with Chi-Rho and Jesus and Christ monograms, followed by name Pason (?), from the rim of a vessel (preserving one third of diameter), with red daubs on exterior.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394060) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394060)
